adventuregame.actions module¶

class actions.Action(method, name, hotkey, **kwargs)¶

Bases: object

Class that maps the chosen action to Player methods.

method¶

The corresponding Player method.

name¶

The name of the Action.

Type

str

hotkey¶

The used hotkey to do this action.

Type

str

kwargs¶

The additional arguments that are needed by some actions.

class actions.Attack(enemy)¶

Bases: actions.Action

Class that maps to the attack method.

class actions.Buy(trader)¶

Bases: actions.Action

Class that maps to the buy method.

class actions.Flee(tile)¶

Bases: actions.Action

Class that maps to the flee method.

class actions.Sell¶

Bases: actions.Action

Class that maps to the sell method.

class actions.ViewInventory¶

Bases: actions.Action

Prints the player’s inventory
